source.name: Fetch data  from Fleet hosts table

processors.name: Fetch data  from Fleet hosts table

properties.db-fetch-sql-query:
SELECT
    id,
    osquery_host_id,
    created_at,
    updated_at,
    node_key,
    hostname,
    uuid,
    platform,
    build,
    platform_like,
    code_name,
    uptime,
    memory,
    cpu_type,
    cpu_subtype,
    cpu_brand,
    cpu_physical_cores,
    cpu_logical_cores,
    hardware_vendor,
    hardware_model,
    hardware_version,
    hardware_serial,
    computer_name,
    primary_ip_id,
    distributed_interval,
    logger_tls_period,
    config_tls_refresh,
    primary_ip,
    primary_mac
FROM hosts
